metadata.title: DuoSync - Sync your appointments with others
metadata.description: DuoSync is the app to synchronize appointments between multiple people. Manage appointments, check shared availability and organize your time together with friends, colleagues or anyone who shares your commitments.
metadata.keywords: DuoSync, appointment synchronization, shared appointments, time management, shared calendar, shared availability, group management, PWA, progressive web app
metadata.ogTitle: DuoSync - Sync your appointments with others
metadata.ogDescription: DuoSync is the app to synchronize appointments between multiple people. Manage appointments, check shared availability and organize your time together with friends, colleagues or anyone who shares your commitments.
metadata.ogImageAlt: DuoSync - Sync your appointments with others

dashboard.subtitle: Fill your appointments to check availability

form.title: Create appointment
form.userRequired: Select a user from the navbar to create an appointment

validation.endBeforeStart: End time must be later than start time
validation.overlap: This interval overlaps with an existing appointment

list.title: Appointments
list.confirmTooltip: Send a request to the other user to approve these slots

loadError.title: Unable to load appointments
loadError.description: Please retry in a few seconds.

selectUser.title: Select a user first
selectUser.description: Appointments are tied to the active profile.

invalidSlot.title: Invalid appointment
invalidSlot.descriptionEndBeforeStart: End time must be later than the start.
invalidSlot.descriptionOverlap: This interval overlaps with an existing appointment.

received.title: New appointment confirmation
received.body: A user has confirmed their appointments. Fill in your appointments to check shared availability.

install.title: Install application
install.available: Install DuoSync on your device for quick access
install.notAvailable: Installation is not available on this device
install.installed: DuoSync is installed on your device

notifications.title: Enable notifications
notifications.enabled: Receive notifications when other users confirm appointments
notifications.disabled: Notifications have been disabled. Enable them from browser settings
notifications.available: Enable notifications to receive important updates
notifications.notSupported: Notifications are not supported on this device
notifications.disabledHint: To re-enable, open browser settings and allow notifications for this site

install.title: Install DuoSync
install.description: Install the app on your device for quick access and a better experience. You can use DuoSync even offline.

setup.title: Welcome to DuoSync
setup.description: Set up the first profile and an access PIN to get started.

notifications.title: Enable notifications
notifications.description: Receive notifications when other users confirm appointments or when there are important updates.

usersManagement.title: User Management
usersManagement.description: Add, edit, or remove users from the system.
usersManagement.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this user? All associated appointments will be removed. This action cannot be undone.

details.createDescription: Enter details for the new user
details.welcomeDescription: Click on "New User" to create a new user, or select an existing user from the list to edit or delete them.
details.noAppointments: No appointments found for this user.

deleteModal.title: Delete User
deleteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action is irreversible and will delete all appointments.

messages.maxUsersReached: Maximum limit of {{max}} users reached. Delete an existing user to create a new one.

appointments.noAppointments: No appointments found for this user
